question:
Consider a glass window with thickness 6 mm, outside surface temperature 3 C,
            and inside surface temperature 20 C. Determine the heat loss through the
            window with height 1.00 m and width 1.80 m. Thermal conductivity of glass is 1.4
            W/m*K. Heat Loss (W) =
title: HeatLossThroughGlassWindowCalculation
